name: The Botanist (itch)
description:
Hi Everyone!

This is our first online game jam! We are proud to share "The Botainst" with you.
Feedbacks are so important for us. Please let us know about the bugs/suggestions/critics. So if you wish to send feedback please follow the link below.

Hope you enjoy! See you soon ^^

Description:

"Our planet is dying, I'm the one from several colonists. We sent different location as far as we can reach in our galaxy. I landed on planet KP0268, found out that the plants on this land can provide oxygen to breath and this is the glimpse of hope that we need. Before i send a signal to my people, i need to provide enough oxygen for them. Right now I'm in this Shelter but soon it will be my home."

This is a hand-crafted 2d puzzle game.

  • Collect plants on map.
  • Place plants on shelf to obtain Oxygen and Fiber.
  • Discover new zones in the map with Oxygen and expand Map Inventory with Fiber.
  • Merge plants to discover new unspawnable plants. These plants are more powerful than the spawnable ones. Also you could see the discovered and undiscovered reciepes from the Reciepes Window.
  • Collect 100.000 Oxygen and discover all zones for end game.

Feedbacks: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSexAnJf48c1WhQqM67Iesr1TroVJk0lGeywNQUT...
